tellAllPlayers(String) - Method in class server.Controller
Sends the given message to all players in the game.

Tells the given player the given message.
tellUserExchanged(String, Tile) - Method in class client.SpectrangleTUI
Tells the user that a player has exchanged one of their tiles.
tellUserFinalResults(String, String) - Method in class client.SpectrangleTUI
Tells the user the final results of the game.
tellUserMoveMade(String, Tile, int, int) - Method in class client.SpectrangleTUI
Tels the user what move has been made based on the given name, tile, index and rotations.
tellUserPlayerKicked(String, boolean) - Method in class client.SpectrangleTUI
Tells the user a player has been kicked and checks if the game can continue.
tellUserSkipped(String) - Method in class client.SpectrangleTUI
Tells the user that a move has been skipped.
